entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 1:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -34.2°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -37.7°C
Wind: NNW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Clear. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
